resources.string: There will be 2 times the level number of balls per level.
To pass the level, you must hit half of the number of balls on the screen.
To hit balls, you must tap the screen where a bomb will appear.
The bomb will explode and hit other balls in its vicinity
If you hit enough balls, your score will be accumulated and you go to the next level
You get three tries to get the number of balls, if not the game restarts.
